1.content:
Mewtwo, as usual, was arguing with Lucario over whom Mew liked more. Suddenly, Lucario sensed Mew's aura. Looking over Mewtwo's shoulder, Lucario noticed Mew reading a magazine with pictures of some rather obese Pokemon. Mewtwo noticed what Lucario was looking at, and both got the same idea: "If Mew likes fat Pokemon, then she'll love me if I'm fat!" They both ran off to get fat.
Now, who shall we follow first?
1.title: It Begins...

11.content: Lucario paced the rooms of his mansion, trying to figure out a way to gain weight to impress Mew. He noticed two flyers for two Pokemon businesses: "Snorlax's Buffet" and "Slaking's Sumo School"!
11.title: Lucario

111.content:
Soon...

"Glad you're here, Lucario." Snorlax said. "I just know you're gonna love it! Now, what would you like?"
Lucario looked over the menu. There were even notes on how much one could gain through it. There was the Mountain Man package, where he could gain 500lbs, the Large/In Charge package, where he would gain 1000lbs, and the "Bigger-Than-Texas" package, where he would gain 2000lbs.
What to choose?
111.title: Go to Snorlax's Buffet

1111.content:
Of course, Lucario would want to be fat, but not TOO fat. He got the Mountan Man Set.

Now seated, lucario slowly got the contents of said order. Should he go slow, or dive in fast?
1111.title: The Mountain Man Package

choices: Go right to Mew and impress her as he digests and gains the 500 pounds
Go to Machoke’s Massage Parlor and get a belly massage to digest fast
11111.content:
Lucario threw the idea of using any sense of patience and started chowing down at full speed the second the scent of all the food reached him. He dug in using mostly his mouth, using his paws more as shovels to fill up his cheeks before each swallow. His belly filled and filled, rounding out quickly, filling his lap, and pushing up against the table! Lucario’s cream colored gut was reaching the ground! Despite how full he was he had to keep eating. It was so good and he had to get big as fast as he could! He finished off the entire meal in just under two hours, sporting a massively round gut like he’d eaten a wrecking ball! The snorlax chimed in, “Wow! I’ve never had someone eat that so fast.”

Despite how quickly he ate, Lucario had hardly digested anything with how quick he ate everything, so he only put on fifty pounds, but was slowly gaining more over time as more digested, his belly still massively distended, nearly as tall as he was. Should he...
11111.title: Eat like a pig.

choices: Mewtwo might be bigger, and already there! I need to get there ASAP
11112.content:
As lucario started his meal, he ate at a slightly faster than normal rate, but still pretty fast. But as Lucario ate, his flat belly was no longer flat. it bulged, now with the food inside it.

{i1 hour later:

Lucario now looked like a fat guy while he was waiting for the food to digest. He looked about 48-ish pounds bigger, and you could tell. Now being a domanant feature, his stomach now was about 5 inches from whete it started, meaning lucario was doing well. He now had A-cup moobs, though they where hardly there. His butt was very... flat compairitively to the rest of him, though it made him slightly taller when sitting. His legs where thicker now, giving the illusion of him always looking overweight, which he was not after coming in here just an hour ago.

as snorelax passes him, he says:
"good job buddy! Ypu should be speeding it up though, the food is best used in one sitting." And then the snorelax was gone.

7 hours later

Lucario just got done with his 500-pound plan. he was huge, no doubt about it. He had three chins, and a start of a fourth, with the rest of his face being rounder. His arms where big, and where kind of annoyong to move around. His legs where huge, looking more like tree trunks. if he walked, you see the, jiggle with fat. His thighs where mot much better, making him 5 1/2 feet from side to side. His butt was also very bis, takong up the entirety of the chair he used. His most dominant feature: his belly. It was 3 feet in front of him, went down to his knees, and jiggled when Lucario breathed.(he really liked that) Heck, his moobs where now C-cup, and bounced when he walked. As the new fatty left the store to mew's house, he found it hard to walk. He was heavy for one thing, and his legs made him waddle. his belly had to be pushed up to walk, because he could not force himself past the huge mass.

Man, this is GREAT! I feel so soft, and very warm! I want to keep this stuff! He thought, and that's before he stopped on a store: Fattys R Us. He wanted to go in, but he needed to think it over, sbould he go in and get fatter?
11112.title: Eat reasonably fast

choices: Easily installable feeder he can set up at mew's house
A life supply of deliverable food
111121.content:
Lucario thought it over and realized he was too big to hurry anywhere and moving with burn calories. Why do that? He wobbles into this store, full of plus sized clothes, durable furniture, and instant food that was obviously bad for anyone. After a few minutes he was greeted by an employee, a chubby female pidgeot. "Hello sir! How may I help you?"

          Lucario looked over and spoke. "Uh... What is the best way for me to get bigger? I have someone to... Uh... Impress." She nods and mentions two things.

choices: His belly began to bugle out.

choices: Mewtwo opens the door, and is the same size as Lucario!
11131121.content:
"...we haven't talked in a while, I was wondering if you want to catch up or something?" Mew said over the cell. Lucario smiled, "Sure, I'll see you at your place." Lucario hanged up the cell.

An hour later after waddling his heavy body down the street, it didn't help that his toes were the only thing showing from his leg fat. Lucario's belly pushed outwards a few feet in front of him, and so did the large mounds of fat behind him that were his ass.

Lucario having to lift his belly the entire way to Mew's house, "I'm so heavy....*pant*..." Lucario hoping to impress Mew, but after walking toward her house he started to think about this for a second. "I think...." Lucario stopped in front of Mew's house. Lucario looked over himself, he felt like a huge teddy bear. Every part of him was soften. His puffy cheeks made him even cuter to anyone looking at him, every time Lucario waddle, his massive moobs jiggled side-to-side, "...I'm loving this~" Lucario waddled up towards Mew's front door, knocking on the door. The door opened and...
11131121.title: Mew Calls Lucario

111312.content: Outside of the restaurant, Mewtwo was thinking up his choices. "Hmm, I could go to the sumo school, but I need to gain weight, not learn somu wrestling, so, I 'll go to the all-you-can-eat buffet." Mewtwo/M2 walked up the steps and into the buffet, where he saw Lucario, blimping up like a balloon. "Lucario? What are you doing here!?" demanded M2 in a loud voice as he floated up to the table. "Oh, it's you..." Said the bloated pokemon eyeing M2's thin waistline. "...see you've gotten far." M2 saw Lucario's blimped form and his small figure. He was way behind. He'd need something drastic if he was to win. "Hey Snorlax..." Said M2 as a floated over to the waiter "...what kind of deal you give him?" "Oh the Large/in charge deal and the bigger the Texas deal." Mewtwo eyed a menu and saw the three deals on it. "Really?" "Really!" "Hmm, well in that case I'll have all three deals!" "All three! Ok, what ever you saw, three courses comin up." "Dang, tonight's hot. What are those guys having an eating contest?" Questioned Snorlax as he ran to the kitchen. As Mewtwo sat down Lucario's chiar broke and collapsed underneath him. "Whoops, there goes that chair." Said lucario with a giggle. Mewtwo on the other hand rolled his eyes and sighed "Oh, I hope that waiter comes back soon..."
111312.title: Mewtwo showed up!

1113122.content:
A minute later Snorlax showed up with all three course ready to eat. "Dig in, just hope you don't burst." Said snorlax as he placed the tray with meals on the table. As Snorlax left, Mewtwo looked back a Lucario. The lox-like pokemon was well over 800 pounds, in fact he was reaching 900! M2, looking at the large mountains that lay before him. With a gulp and a frazzled look he grabbed a piece of chicken, but then got and idea. Opening his mouth as wide as it would go, he used his psyhic powers to shove the food into his mouth and down his throat. Instantly his body began to explode outward with fat, his belly expanding like a balloon, his already chubby tail growing fatter, his skinny limbs becoming rounder with each passing second. Lucario was keeping his pace, not noticing Mewtwo's expanse. He was at 950 and was now immobile, sitting on the floor eating. His belly was huge, ballooned immensly, laying over his lap and onto the floor. His tail was fat and stubby yet it some how managed to not get smoothered by Lucario's growing buttocks. His limbs had become thich, and he was starting to develop a third chin. On top of that, his face looked comincal with his cheecks expanded like as if he was a squirel full of nuts. Soon the majority of the Large/in charge meal was gone, it's contents inside Lucario's belly and it's calories embedded in his fat. He grabbed the plate and licked the plate of any scraps, whipping it clean. When he was done he had a weight of 1001 pounds, his ballooned belly letting out a satisfied gurgle. "Your doing great belly..." said Lucario as he rubbed his stomach "...now get ready for the main course!"
Meanwhile...
1113122.title: A minute later...

11131221.content: Mewtwo was continuing to force food down his gullet with his psyhic powers. He was gobbling up the Bigger then Texas meal, and he was already half way done. At 1000 pounds he was about as ballooned as Lucario, but growing at a faster pace. His stomach looked like a big huge purple ball, his tail resembling a short, fat purple slug. He floated in the air, growing bigger and heavier, racing to be the fattest. Lucario on the other hand, focusing on size, not speed, was sitting down, eating his food. His arms had become heavy and it was difficult to grab food and put it to his mouth, so he took asuggestion from Mewtwo and used his poweres to eat the food. He took large chunks of food, floated them to his mouth, and ate them. He savored each gulp, his body making the best of each swallow. His tail was growing with his buttokcs, keeping from being swallowed. His belly was huge, the biggest of his features. It was bloated with food and fat, expanding outward, resting on the floor. As the huge belly grew larger it pushed the table forward. As Lucario was 2000 pounds! And as Lucario finished off half his Bigger than Texas deal Mewtwo was already finished with his! With both Pokemon equaly fatten and blimped, who would come out on top?
11131221.title: Friece, fatten competition

choices: Mewtwo has an idea involving his latest invention...
They head to the Sumo School
111312211.content:
Mewtwo seemed to have won... at least for a few minutes, because he passed out! After that, Lucario finished the rest of his meal... and promptly passed out, as well!

The next morning:

Mewtwo and Lucario stumbled out into the street, equally fat, trying to decide where to go next...
111312211.title: Mewtwo

1113122111.content:
"I've got it!" said MEwtwo, shaking a few cobwebs out of his head (which made his upper body jiggle). "What? (And would you mind not screaming like that?)" said Lucario, turning his head as best he could.

Mewtwo's Castle...

"Yeesh, all this fuss over gaining for me? And how did you know I liked fat Pokemon so much?" said Mew, through a hose.

Mewtwo, Lucario, and Mew (who had insisted on being a part in this), were strapped down on tables. Mew had a controller nearby (which she could operate with her psychic powers), and the tables, contoller, and aforementioned hose (there was one in each of their mouths, actually) were connected to a massive machine with more gibbets, odds, ends, creases, folds, etc, than a seven-ended pinapple. "Yes. Now, i call this the 'Gain-O-Matic'. I made it when i was trying new things, but never had a chance to actually use it before. It basically feeds us a mixture of a formula designed to instantly fatten us (while sending our tastebuds on a pleasure cruise), the most fattening foods ever, and this element I discovered last week called 'Fat-Mercury'. It also sends us oxygen so we can breathe. Now, when I say 'Go', Mew, concentrate on activating the controller. Ready? GO!"

Immediately, Mew activated teh controller, and a strange-looking viscous goop began flowing into their mouths... and they began gaining!

"Mewtwo?" Lucario said, using telepathy. "What did you set it for?"
1113122111.title: Gain-O-Matic

111312212.content:
It was neck and neck between the two, Lucario was getting near the end of his meal and Mewtwo was half way threw his. The large pile on Mewtwo's end was shrinking fast. His large purple balloon belly, though made like rubber, was being pushed to it's limits as more and more food was inhaled. Lucario was still going at his pace, taking the large chunks and eating them. The pile got smaller and smaller as Lucario's belly got larger and larger. With a few more gulps his belly pushed the table to the floor. But Lucario snatched the plate with his powers. since there were onl a few small piles left he lowered the plated and let the food slide into his mouth. He chewed the food and swallowed it, gulping donw the last of his meal. With a few licks of the plate he had cleaned it off. Lucario let out a satisfied burp, then smiled as he looked at his form. His bodily features were ballooned to huge proportions, his limbs like tree trucks, buttocks like monster truck tires with a bloated tail in between and a belly bloated far outward, laying on the floor standing out in front over several feet from it's master. Lucario patted his belly. "Good work little guy, now rest for a moment." Lacario said with praise. Mewtwo how ever was not resting and had finished the Bigger than Texas deal. He was eating the smallest pile, the mountain meal, sucking it up like a vacuum cleaner. In less than a minute Mewtwo has cosumed the whole thing! Even so, his belly had taken major abuse, grugling and moaning, struggling to keep the massive amount of food in side it. It was ballond out majorly, in a shperical shape, his other body parts ballooned in a comical fashion. "Ugh, I feel sick, but this pain is nothing compaired to the fruits of victory." "Not so fast..." Lucario butted in "...You forgot about dessert!" "*gulp* Dessert!?" Snorlax then came out, wheeling a cart with a huge bowl of special whipped ice cram. Mewtwo want to ask for dessert as well, but his belly was in far too much pain for that. "Oh, I've lost!" Snorlax wheeled the cart next to Lucario. "Here it is, dig in!" This time instead of multiple gulps Lucario consumed it in one big swallow! He sucked down the cream like a giant drain in no time! In a matter of seconds the cream was down Lucario's throat and into his belly. It was now ballooned enormously, bloated up to over twelve feet out. It had a half circle shape, like some rising sun. It gurgled and rumbled loudly, indicating it was done. "You did a great job belly, thanks!" Cheered Lucario as he let out a huge burp. The crowd that had gathered over the coarse of the contest to watch the showdown cheered widely. Mewtwo looked at Lucario and sigh "Heh, I guess you win." "Yep, guess Mew's goona be spendin' time with me now." "Oh no you don't this is not over yet, just wait till tommorow!" "When nobody's going anywhere til they pay the bill!" Said snorlax strongly. "B-bill?" The two bloated competitors said together. "Yeah, you boys did bring money right?" "MONEY!?" Said Mewtwo and Lucario, looking at each other with flushed faces.

Meanwhile, Mew was busy finishing up her magazine when the phone rang. She picked it up and on the other end was...
111312212.title: Lucario

1113122121.content:
"Um, is this Mew?" Snorlax said into the phone from his end of the line. "Yeah." "Well, your two 'boyfriends' just about nearly ran me outta business. Not only that then have no dough to pay for they're meals, so unless you want them to be my restuarants mascots I suggest you get down here right away." "Ok, I'll be there." Mew said in a dissappointed voice as she hung up the phone. Mew grabbed her ruby red purse, and floted to the middle of the living room. "Ugh, what have those two done this time?" She said disgruntedly as she teleported away.

She teleported to the front doors of the restuarant, letting out a long sigh. "Ok, once again they went Johnny Knoxville on me and did something stupid. Just act cool, give the restuarant owner the money, then straggle those two when we get home!" She pushed the doors open and floated into the main dining area. "Alright you two ju..." Before Mew could finish her sentence she saw Lucario and Mewtwo, sitting on the floor belching and rubbin they're bellies. Mew suddenly felt, shocked, angered, and even more outraged, but also felt a sense of futher sexuality between the two. Her love for fat pokemon had always been her dirrty little secret: she didn't want others except other legendaries that she had a fat fetish. She was day dreaming of rubbing they're bloated stomachs and kissing them, but her thoughts were interupted by someone tapping her shoulder. "Um, my money please." Snoralx said. "Ok, how much?" Snorlax whipped out his old calculator and started punching in numbers. "Well, The fox guy ate a Large/in charge and a Bigger then Texas meals plus an extra large desert. Your clone buddy over there had the two meals plus the moutain man deal. And Lucario broke a chair so that sets you back $1,578 dollars short." "1,578 dollars!?" "Sorry, that's how the cookie crumbles." Mew fidddled around in her purse and got out a thousand dollar bill plus 5 hundreds, 7 tens, and 8 ones. "Here's your change." Mew said in a grumbled voice. "Thank you, come agian" snorlax replied in a friendly tone. "Don't bet on it..." Mew grumbled back. she floated over to her two bloated boyfriends. "Urp, hi Mew." Lucario said in a friendly but nervous voice. "Oh, sorry about the mess." Mewtwo replied. Mew let out another long sigh. "Just drop it. Lets take you guys home, clean you up, and set you two to bed. We can argue in the morning." Mew then flaoted between the two massive slob blobs and teleported them back to her house. As she teleported, she was thinking about her friends new found weight. Though on the outside she looked tired and defeated inside she felt absolutly giddy. "Oh man, hate them for what they did but now they look so sexy, especially Lucario, no Mewtwo. Oh, if only I could share it with them." And with that she got an idea.

Later that night, Lucario and Mewtwo were resting in the living room, sleeping off they're huge feast. Mew, quietly spying on them, picked up her cellphone and dial a number. The phone on the other end rang loudly, slowly waking up...
1113122121.title: Snorlax

11131221211112.title: Can you make Mewtwo and Lucario bigger

11131221212.content:
(Happy 12th Anniversary pokemon franchise!)

The phone on the other end was ringing loudly, stirring a striped creature with big horns. It's stripes where in a pattern: Black white, black white, like bands all around his body. His four twig-like fingers and three stubby toes were black, his horns and tail following the pattern of his body. One eye was white, surrounded by a black patch while the other was black surrounded by a white patch. This strange creature was Charley Zimmer, famous FA and story writter, as well as movie lover. He slowly woke up, wiggling and rubbing his eyes. He sat up and mindlessly fimbled his hands around til he found the phone. He picked it up and put it to his ear. "Hello?" "Charley, you there?" "Uh, whose there?" "Don't you remember me?" Charley scratched his head a second, then it came to him. "Mew!?" "Yes!" "Oh hey Mew, been a long time since you called, why you waking me up?" Mew then explained everything as quickly and as clearly as she could in great detail. "So, the boys were at it again?" "uh-hu." "And you want me to come over there bcuz..." "Because I wanna show them I love them both equally, can you help me do it?" "Sue thing!" Charley said, snapping his fingers. "I'll be there before you can say, bye!" And with that Charley hung up the phone. Mew rubbed her hands together, smiling from ear to ear. "Now all I have to do is wait.."

Mew waited for about thirty minutes, starting to grow impatient. "Oh, where is he?" She then saw headlights shine though the forest. "oh good, hes here!" An old, rusty tanker truck, a 55 Peterbilt to be exact, roared out of the forest with Charley behind the wheel. It was hauling an old tank, with the word 'Flammable' written in faded letters on the sides and back. "Oh boy.." Mew said smiling, shaking her head side to side "...so typical of Charley." The truck soon came to a stop and Charley turned the key, making the engine slow then stop, becoming quiet. As the motor and brakes hissed lightly, Charley climbed out of the cab. 'So, what do you think? Huh, HUH?" Mew but her hands to her sides. "I think you've been watching too many movies Charley." "In some ways, NOT ENOUGH!" Chuckled the striped being as it jumped off the truck. "So, this what you got?" Mew said as she floated next to Charley. "Yep, this what I got." Said Charley as he walked down the side of the tank. "Hmm, doesn't look like much." "Oh baby, this stuff is podent!" He said with flare as he rubbed the tank. "So what is this mixture yo got in there?" "Liquid butter, cooknig oil, grease, a few other household chemicals, and the proper perportions." Mew laughed lightly at his last comment. "Ok, set it up." "Ok, if you say so."

Mew put a tube into her mouth, gribbing it lightly with her jaw. "Now, you sure you don't wanna back down?" Mew gave him a fierce flare. Charley let out a light sigh, he was a little worried just how BIG the effects were gonna be. "Ok, don't say I didn't warn you.." He then turned the wheel on the side of the tank, opening up the valves. He had it set on...
11131221212.title: Enter C.Z.

111312212121.content: He had the valves set at 1,000 pounds a minute. The weight gain liquid slipped through the tube, went out the nozzle, down Mew's throat, and finally landed in her belly. Instantly she blimped out, her stomach ballooning outward, growing, gaining a rotund shape as fat piled onto her body. In less then a minute she was well over a ton! "Oh, guess I made the mixture too potent." But Mew wasn't complaining, She was smiled, enjoying her belly being bloated, filling out and expanding like a balloon as more fat pile onto her, making her a small hill. Seeing mew so happy made Charley Zimmer feel at ease, he himself loving her expansion. "Mmm, more, MORE!" Mew mental cried out. "ie, ie, captain!" Charley Zimmer said with a salute. He then grabbed the wheel and turned it all the way, opening the valves to the max!
111312212121.title: Mew's gain

1113122121211.content:
Hours later the sun slowly rose over the horizon. Sunlight pierced the darkness that filled the livingroom, prying open the eyes of the two late night belly bloaters. "Uh, is it morning already?" Asked Lucario "Hmm, friad so." "Well, guess we better find Mew." "Yeah, lets." Mewtwo floated into the air, allowing him to have mobility desite his huge form. Lucario on the other hand was stuck, unable to move around, the fat ancoring him down. "Um, a little help please?" "Oh, sure." Mewtwo used some more of his mental energy to lift Lucario off the ground givving him some movement. "Oh, thanks." "No, problem." Soon the floated out the front door, calling for Mew by name. "Mew?" "MEW?" "Mew?" "MEW..." Mewtwo freezed. He mentally tapped Lucario on the shoulder. "What, wha..." Looking up, the two saw Mew. They found her all right, a very BIG her! Her belly and body where bloated out of preportions! Her belly was enormous, bigger then a balloon in a parade. It's big pink mass quivered lightly, degesting it's belly busting meal. Mew's buttocks were huge, each three times the size of monster truck tires. Her tail surprisingly absorbed little fat, but as a result had been swallowed by her butt cheecks. Her legs were like to big round balls on each side, swallowing her feet. Her arms were in a similar state, though they were each bloated like two balls with tiny, nearly swallowed hands at the ends. Her back was hugely bloated and her neck was swallowed in three extra chins. Her cheeks were extremely puffed up, giving her the look of a squirrel with it's cheeks filled wth nuts almost to the max(It's kinda easy to imagine since Mew looks like a squirrel anyway). She giggled softly, her quivering mass shaving like a blob of Jell-O. "M-mew, you ok?" Asked Lucario as he and Mewtwo both starred wide-eyed. With that question Mew used her powers to float them up over to her level, since her back streched to acomidate her new form. The floated up the peaks of the mountain known as Mew until her were settled down near the peak, on Mew's large chest, staring at her bloated head and neck. "Mew, is that you?" Asked Mewtwo. "Yes, it is." She let out another giggled, making her fat quiver more. "I, don't understand you..." Before Lucario could finish Mew butted in. "Well, seeing you to guys bloated just got me running wild. I wanted you guys to understand I love you both the same, You each have qualities that I like, and I don't see how you can't share." "Heh, it's wont be hard..." Mewtwo retorted "..there's plenty of you to go around." Mew smiled, her eyes giving off they're friendly glow. "But, now your so huge..." Said Lucario "...Are you ever gonna be the same?" "Oh, I'm still the same, theres just more of me to love." The three of them then just burst out laughing, they bellies jiggling like Jell-O.

On the peak above, Charley Zimmer stared at the sight though his binoculars. Seeing them all happy he smiled, leting out his large grin. "Well.." He said as he put put his hands to his side, standing in a proud stance "...Another job well done." He said with a wink.

info.brief_description: Lucario and Mewtwo get fat to impress Mew.
info.description: Everyone knows Lucario likes Mew. Everyone knows Mewtwo likes Mew. But Lucario and Mewtwo keep trying to make Mew like him more! So, when they spot Mew reading a magazine with some rather fat Pokemon in it, they decide to get big!
